english_translation: Narrated by Abu Hadrad al-Aslami: The Messenger of Allah ﷺ said on the day of Hudaybiyyah: 'Who will drive our camels?' A man said: 'I will.' He ﷺ asked: 'What is your name?' He said: 'So-and-so.' The Prophet ﷺ said: 'Sit down.' Then another man stood up. He asked: 'What is your name?' He said: 'So-and-so.' He said: 'Sit down.' Then another man stood up. He asked: 'What is your name?' He said: 'Najiyyah.' The Prophet ﷺ said: 'You are the one for it. Drive it.'
